title: Double play: kings of baseball
creator_credit: Chicago Film Studios, American and National Leagues of Professional Baseball Clubs, A Apalding and Lew Fonseca
brief_description: Shows the conditions and skills in the “double play” in baseball (running out two, or more, batters from the one play).
